subject: Automobile Racing
Rain
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kurt Busch was awarded his first victory of the season after the Lenox Industrial Tools 301 was stopped 17 laps early because of a robust thunderstorm.
snippet: Kurt Busch was awarded his first victory of the season after the Lenox Industrial Tools 301 was stopped 17 laps early because of a robust thunderstorm.
